mysql_date_insert.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 
00003 """
00004 Something odd is happening and my dates are getting munged when I copy them from one
00005 database to another. This is some testing to try and figure out what is happening.
00006 """
00007 
00008 
00009 import MySQLdb, sys, time
00010 
00011 dbUser = "root"
00012 dbPass = ""
00013 dbName = "test"
00014 
00015 tableName = "date_test_" + time.strftime("%Y_%m_%d_%H_%M_%S")
00016 
00017 dbCreated = False
00018 
00019 try:
00020     db = MySQLdb.connect(user=dbUser, db=dbName)
00021 except MySQLdb.Error, details:
00022     if details[0] == 1049: # unknown database error
00023         db = MySQLdb.connect(user=dbUser)
00024         db.query("create database %s" % dbName)
00025         dbCreated = True
00026         db.close()
00027         db = MySQLdb.connect(user=dbUser, db=dbName)
00028     else:
00029         print details
00030         sys.exit(1)
00031 
00032 try:
00033     dbCursor = db.cursor()
00034     insertCursor = db.cursor()
00035     dbCursor.execute("create table %s (id int auto_increment primary key, date date not null, timestamp timestamp default current_timestamp)" % tableName)
00036     insertCursor.execute("insert into %s (date, timestamp) values (%%s, %%s)" % tableName, ("1995-01-25", "1995-01-25"))
00037     insertCursor.execute("insert into %s (date) values (now())" % tableName)
00038     dbCursor.execute("select timestamp from %s" % tableName)
00039     while 1:
00040         dbRow = dbCursor.fetchone()
00041         if dbRow is None: break
00042         insertCursor.execute("insert into %s (date) values (%%s)" % tableName, dbRow[0])
00043 
00044     dbCursor.execute("select id, date, timestamp from %s order by id" % tableName)
00045     while 1:
00046         dbRow = dbCursor.fetchone()
00047         if dbRow is None: break
00048         print "%s: %s - %s" % (dbRow[0], dbRow[1], dbRow[2])
00049     
00050     if dbCreated:
00051         db.query("drop database %s"% dbName)
00052     else:
00053         dbCursor.execute("drop table %s" % tableName)
00054         
00055     db.close()
00056 except NameError:
00057     pass
